author: Lin Shi & Cui Jianxin
notes: ISO 639-3: aih This dialect of Ai-Cham (ʔai3 ȶam1) is from Gengfang Hamlet (ʔəu1 vu:ŋ1), Diwo Township, Jialiang District, Libo County, Qiannan Prefecture, Guizhou Province, China. The Diwo dialect is more representative of Ai-Cham than the other varieties are.Source: Lin, Shi and Cui Jianxin. 1988. \An investigation of the Ai-Cham language.\" In Jerold A. Edmondson and David B. Solnit (eds.)
problems: Comparative Kadai: Linguistic studies beyond Tai
classification: 59-85. Summer Institute of Linguistics Publications in Linguistics
typedby: 86. Dallas: Summer Institute of Linguistics and the University of Texas at Arlington.
